body_html: @kratzert I, too, have experienced issues with getting GPUs to 100% usage and keeping them there. The Dataset API, it seems, is implemented less efficiently and though it is a welcome change regarding code clarity and simplicity as well as a more natural way of doing training and validation, it cannot (yet) substitute queues for high data rate usecases, such as computer vision.

body: @kratzert I, too, have experienced issues with getting GPUs to 100% usage and keeping them there. The Dataset API, it seems, is implemented less efficiently and though it is a welcome change regarding code clarity and simplicity as well as a more natural way of doing training and validation, it cannot (yet) substitute queues for high data rate usecases, such as computer vision.
